title: Ukulele Chord Trainer
no_more_forward: [MISSING] No further forward possible, you're already at the current chord.
already_latest: [MISSING] You're already at the latest chord.
restart_info_text: Prego riavviare l'applicazione per applicare le modifiche al layout
info_description:
Questo programma genera accordi casuali per l'ukulele e supporta il controllo vocale.
E' destinato ad utenti  principianti ed esperti.
short_manual_text: • Clicca su 'Prossimo accordo' per passare al prossimo accordo.
• Oppure pronuncia 'avanti' per passare ad un nuovo accordo usando il controllo vocale.
• Gli accordi sono presentati casualmente senza ripetizioni.
• Tutti gli accordi già suonati sono salvati nel file 'last_chords.txt'.
timer_text: {seconds_left} secondi rimasti prima del prossimo accordo
editor_save_success_message: [MISSING] All data is valid. Save (dummy) successful.
editor_confirm_delete_message:
[MISSING] Are you sure you want to permanently delete the selected entry/entries?
This action cannot be undone.
editor_confirm_close_message: [MISSING] There are unsaved changes. Save before closing?
error_editor_saving_message: [MISSING] An error occured while saving the data. Please try again.
error_editor_invalid_chord_name: [MISSING] Invalid chord name '{name}' in {level} level, row {row_index}.
error_editor_minimum_length: [MISSING] At least {min_length} elements must be present in {col} at level {level}, row {row_index}.
error_editor_invalid_note_format: [MISSING] Invalid note format '{value}' in {col} at level {level}, row {row_index}. Only letters A-G and symbols like # or b are allowed.
error_editor_invalid_interval_format: [MISSING] Invalid interval format '{value}' in {col} at level {level}, row {row_index}. Only numbers and prefixes like b or # are allowed.
error_editor_no_treeview_for_tab: [MISSING] No Treeview found for the current tab '{tab_name}'.
error_editor_empty_or_placeholder_value: [MISSING] [Tab '{level}', Row {row_index}] Empty or placeholder value in column '{col}'
error_editor_dot_instead_of_comma: [MISSING] [Tab '{level}', Row {row_index}] Dot instead of comma in column '{col}': {value}
error_editor_empty_list_element: [MISSING] [Tab '{level}', Row {row_index}] Empty element in list at column '{col}': {value}
error_editor_duplicate_chord_name: [MISSING] [Tab '{level}', Row {row_index}] Duplicate chord name: '{name}' (previously in row {previous_row})
error_editor_validation_message: [MISSING] There are {errors} invalid cell(s). Please fill all fields correctly and remove placeholders.
error_editor_no_selection_message: [MISSING] Please select a row to delete.
error_no_chords_for_difficulty: Nessun accordo trovato per questo livello di difficoltà
_comment: Non tradurre nulla in {}, lascia così
